name: LowerRespiratoryExcludingSputumSpecimenTypeSNOMED
title: Lower Respiratory [Excluding Sputum] (Specimen Type) (SNOMED)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: SNOMED code(s) for type of specimen used for laboratory test, such as blood, stool, specimen from a normally sterile site, respiratory specimen.),(Data Element Scope: Specimens for laboratory testing as documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: lower respiratory specimens),(Exclusion Criteria: sputum)
